name: Estensa
tag_list: web-agency-napoli, web-design-napoli, web-marketing-napoli, preventivo-sito-web, customer-relationship-management, crm, sales-force-automation, content-management, e-business, intranet, extranet, sistemi-gestionali, global-internet-marketing, siti-web, sy
overview: Estensa is a web agency specialized in the design and development of complex web applications. It provides web design services, internet marketing and search engine optimization (SEO) as well as professional hosting and housing solutions. Its services include competitors and benchmarking analysis (structure, look-and-feel, user interface design), technical analysis and conception of web projects, user interface design, markup and engineering development. Estensa has developed a special CMS, a software solution that allows the customer to autonomously manage his web site or portal. We have conceived a special CMS dedicated to the management of ecommerce websites. Estensa also offers special tools dedicated to tourism, tour operators and travel agencies to enable the operators to manage booking and travel packaging.
